column4: all my selections from login settings under ubuntu-tweak is disabled? how to enable it ?
to right corner should be an "unlock" button
also changed the icon theme, and tried few , but din;t like any, again got back to the ubuntu-mono-dark one, but icons are not changing :(
ctrl+alt+f1 then login and 'sudo service lightdm stop'  (assuming you're on a default 11.10+ ubuntu)
yep that's why I added the '+'
